title: FS  RARE 1887 N284 Buchner gold coin Dave Orr
author: hcv123

posts.post_title: FS  RARE 1887 N284 Buchner gold coin Dave Orr
posts.post_content: There is a single example graded by PSA (A 5).  Only 5 by SGC (5.5 being the best of them).  Rarely offered.  From the original "NY Mets".  $450 obo.  Price is net to me and includes insured delivery.  I collect sales tax from New York delivery addresses.
Beautiful card! If I didn't have one of those Dave Orr SGC's you mentioned, I'd be all over it. Good luck.

I would also consider a trade (with or without cash as needed) for a trade for an E or T Hall of Famer or 1950's Mantle, Mays, Clemente or Robinson.  Open to most technical conditions, but need nice eye appeal.
